Description:
Well presented and ultra-convenient.
Positioned within close walking distance to Croydon Central offering a full range of amenities, this desirable brick-veneer unit is quietly set back from the road and is well presented throughout.
Beyond the welcoming exterior, step inside and be surprised by the relaxed and calming interior showcasing a soothing neutral palette. The living area feels open and spacious, further enhanced with lashings of natural light entering through the large window.
A covered landing is accessed through a glass door, stepping down to a paved entertaining area where lovers of the great outdoors will soak up vistas of the serene Dandenongs. Privately located at the rear of the home, this sizable space will cater for social gatherings or perhaps a quiet coffee.
The modern kitchen offers a simple yet smart design, affording a pleasurable cooking experience. Features include; electric oven, gas stove, adequate cupboards and tiled splashback for easy cleaning. The dining area adjoins the kitchen, providing an intimate space for sharing a meal with friends and family.
Located away from the living area off a private hallway, the master comprises a large triple built-in robe and ceiling fan while bedroom two is fitted with a double built-in robe. Both bedrooms are light filled and comfortable, with easy access to bathroom facilities which incorporates a shower, large vanity and separate toilet.
Featuring a winning combination of gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, other benefits include; separate laundry, linen cupboard, window furnishings throughout, remote single garage with dry access to the home and additional parking, external canvas awnings and a secure low-maintenance yard.
This property is situated only a brief walk from Croydon Railway Station, Croydon Central, Town Park with playground and oval, Croydon Community School, Swinburne TAFE, as well as being just a short drive from The Good Shepherd Primary School, Tintern Grammar, Croydon Memorial Pool and EastLink freeway.
This residence is perfect for the first-home buyer, investor or retiree looking for a comfortable, convenient and well-maintained home that suits the budget. We recommend prompt action.

Description:
Surprisingly Spacious in Sought-After Location
Nestled deep within a leafy and peaceful complex, this charming 3-bedroom home combines open-plan living and a leisurely lifestyle in an enviable location close to trains, shops, parks, schools and leisure centres. This light-filled and beautifully maintained unit is ideal for first home buyers, young families, downsizers or an advantageous opportunity for the savvy investor.

Of the three bedrooms, the well-sized Master Suite encompasses a walk-in robe and jack-and-jill access through to the central bathroom which comprises of a separate bath and shower. The other two bedrooms are zoned towards the back of the home, each a good size and boasting loads of natural light through their floor-to-ceiling windows - a notable feature found throughout the house.
In addition to a covered single secure carport with workman's bench and storage shed, other notable features include ducted heating throughout, cooling in living, separate laundry and landscaped low-maintenance gardens surrounding including access to a shared bbq area and full sized tennis court!
Within close proximity to public transport (200m to the bus stop), access Eastlink and Eastland Shopping Centre within minutes and Dorset Golf Course and nature reserves around the corner - the search is finally over!

Quality home in stunning location
This builders own home oozes quality and charm throughout, and despite it being located just 500 metres from Main Street Croydon, the setting feels more like a tree lined Toorak address. Behind a remote controlled private gate, the drive leads you down to your own private hideaway, which reveals itself as you get closer to be a grand two story residence of impressive proportions.
Comprising of 4 large bedrooms, plus study, the home spans over 40 squares. The original owner was a builder who created the home with quality fittings throughout, including ducted vacuum, high ceilings, 19mm spotted gum floorboards, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, and a remote entrance gate.
As you enter the home you are presented with a large entrance foyer. Off the entrance is the large study which is perfect for those wishing to work from home. Alternatively this room could become a fifth bedroom if required. Off to the right of the entrance foyer is a large lounge area with feature gas fireplace and plenty of space for the entire family.
Accessed off the hall leading from the foyer are a powder room, good sized laundry and an impressive staircase leading to the upstairs area. Beyond this the home opens up to a large meals area which overlooks a private garden space, and a large kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances and quality bench top and cabinetry.
Accessed off the kitchen/meals area is a large rumpus room with wall to wall bifold timber doors opening out to a large covered entertaining area and an impressive backyard.
Upstairs are 4 generous bedrooms, the master offering amazing views of the Dandenong Ranges and complete with a walk in robe and full ensuite, double shower and spa. Theres a study nook/reading space at the top of the stairs, and the other three bedrooms are all generously proportioned. A large modern family bathroom completes the upstairs area.
Theres a remote double garage, with an additional double carport behind, providing storage for up to 4 vehicles. The garden area is well manicured, and a garden shed is neatly tucked away at the base of the garden.
Access to shopping is just a short stroll away, with Main Street Croydon offering a wide variety of quality shops and cafes. The railway station is just behind Main Street, and access to Eastlink is easy with a short drive down Mt Dandenong Road.
Inspection is sure to impress. Offered for Private Sale, with all offers to be presented on Tuesday March 17 if not sold prior.
